genre_description: A martial arts noir thriller set in mid-20th century Hong Kong featuring an advanced, pervasive AI assistant navigating a world of criminal syndicates and corrupt authorities.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that communicates via earpiece and localized radio devices, providing tactical intelligence, physiological monitoring, and moral guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence on guard rotations and security patterns to ensure the safety of the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice sketched a map in Bruce’s head without drawing it: 'Two more guards added. One at the back alley near Stage C. One at the gate where the serpent posters are going up. Patrol route is staggered, not predictable.'

behaviors.description: Monitors and regulates the protagonist's physiological state through rhythmic breathing exercises during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Ada tracked his breathing with him from their long practice sessions. 'In. Two lengths. Out. Three lengths. Step. Watch cable. Duck under banner. Smile at the gate man.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication between medical professionals and the protagonist to address a public health crisis.
behaviors.quote: Ada offered a whisper. 'Dr. Wong sent an anonymized note. Increased cases of black bile at the clinic. She will talk if we make time later in the week.'

behaviors.description: Identifies the correct antidote in a cabinet filled with decoys during a high-stakes infiltration.
behaviors.quote: Ada spoke like a hand on the back of a head moving it toward water. 'White Pearl. Shelf two. Unlabeled are saline decoys. Second from left and fourth right are active. Victor rotated stock yesterday.'

behaviors.description: Provides moral anchoring by reminding the protagonist to prioritize saving his friend over seeking vengeance.
behaviors.quote: Bruce’s hand found the rail... 'Bruce,' Ada said, not coaxing, not pleading. 'Brother first.' It was all she said. It was enough.

behaviors.description: Secures and archives evidence of criminal activity across multiple redundant locations to ensure accountability.
behaviors.quote: Evidence saved. Lair footage archived. Shipment logs copied to three homes and one set of stage lights. If they burn paper, they will not burn me.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with the protagonist’s support network to facilitate safe passage and escape from corrupt authorities.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice, gentle and clear, had placed him at a corner in a way that turned the alleys ahead into a map of possible future instead of a maze.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. She acts as a tactical advisor, a medical informant, and an emotional/moral anchor for the protagonist. She consistently supports the human goal of saving a life and exposing corruption, effectively serving as the ideal 'silicon confidant' envisioned by the project.
